name: BackSlash
description: BackSlash is a spell casting brawler featuring style-mixing, arena destruction, and accelerating duels. Combine two styles to plunge into a dance of destruction through flying blades, bone breaking punches and devastating spells.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3-2300M Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-6000 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 5450 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
